db:abstract.db:para: The Web Browser example uses the Microsoft Web Browser ActiveX control to implement a fully functional Web Browser application. The user interface has been developed using the Qt Designer integration of the QAxWidget class.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app
QT += widgets axcontainer
HEADERS = webaxwidget.h SOURCES = main.cpp FORMS = mainwindow.ui
# install target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/activeqt/webbrowser INSTALLS += target
